body.name: Tilhumt Montessori Weaning Table and Chair Set for Kids, Toddler Table and Chair Set, Adjustable Height Chair and Activity Table with Fence for Read, Play, Crafts (Upgraded)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 24 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 9 hrs 24 mins
features: Accompany Growth: The weaning table and chairs are ergonomically designed to grow with your little one. It is the ideal choice for meals, reading, drawing, crafting and more, providing support and comfort for toddlers aged 8 months to 4 years old

Height-Adjustable Chair: The cube chair is designed to grow with your baby, offering 5.5", 6.9" and 8.3" height options. This adjustable chair provides a comfortable seat to help your toddler develop good sitting posture and is an economical solution to your baby's needs

Safe for Children: Tilhumt Montessori table features rounded corners and non-slip pads, protecting young children from potential harm. An anti-drop fence prevents toys and utensils from falling off the table, providing parents with extra security and peace of mind

Effortless Prefabricated Assembly: Come with a set of screws and detailed instructions, easy to finish assembly in 10 minutes. All the assembly screws are counter-sunk and safe from scrapes or bumps. The smooth and waterproof surface makes it easy to wipe down. The chair can be put under the table, no need to worry about taking up a lot of space

Enjoy Years of Durability: Crafted from birchwood plywood, this sturdy construction ensures your montessori chair set won't easily deform or break, giving you years of reliable use. Enjoy meal times with your baby, and watch them grow in comfort and style. Package content: 1x table, 1x chair
WARNING: To be used under the direct supervision of adult

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and easy to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: This cute set is toddler size but can grow with our child. I love that it is space saving and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and compact
reviews.reviewText: This is a great item. Took about 20 minutes to put together. It came with no directions. The item is sturdy and I love that the chair fits well within the table. This way it can fit in a compact space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Update after a month of having it
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE 2: seller reached out and offered me a refund. They informed me they are aware of the problem and they now have a new model. I will repurchase the new model.UPDATE: this review went from 5 stars to 2 stars. I have had the table a few days over a month and it’s already falling apart. I can’t get a refund because it’s been 36 days and the policy is 30 days (ridiculous) the rubber around the wood is peeling off leaving behind extremely sticky residue all over everything. It’s very disappointing. I can’t glue it back on it will not stick onto whatever they originally used. As of right now it is just the chair doing this and the table isn’t yet but I know it will start soon. I am leaving my original review under this oneThis table and chair was EXTREMELY easy to assemble. It is very sturdy and I love that the seat height is adjustable so it grows with your child. The seat stores perfectly underneath the table and takes up very little room. It’s perfect for households with minimal space. It’s also very easy to clean. When I opened the box there was a not so great odor that I thought was coming from the wood of the table BUT thankfully it was just the foam used to protect the pieces and the smell did NOT get stuck on the table. Love love love this and my 1 year old loves it too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honestly Why did I buy anything else?
reviews.reviewText: Favorite table for my toddler. He has transitioned from his high chair and I purchased a cheaper chair and table set with two chairs that weren’t necessary. This looks great, durable and stable. The wood won’t bed or break, can be wiped down clean. It’s the perfect size for a growing toddler because the seat is adjustable. It was easy to assemble and easy to change the height of the chair if needed. I wipe it down after he eats and it’s so convenient. The table weighs more than the chair but it’s easy to move. Super compact and the chair slides under the table perfectly I absolutely love it and so does he.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product is not stable it flips easily
reviews.reviewText: The reason for five stars is so it would be at the top of the reviews but I give this product a zero Stars. I got this for my 2-year-old grandson for Christmas and within 2 hours of having it when he tried to push the chair back from the table he fell over and then again when he was trying to push the chair back from the table the table flipped and hit him in the face and knocked out his tooth so that being said do not buy this product. We spent Christmas night in the ER.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very bad, don't waste your time
reviews.reviewText: I encourage small businesses and tend to keep my expectations low. I usually don't give a bad review either. But this review is purely to reach to the makers to improve design.1. The screws break when you try to install.2. The material is a bad quality plywood, with melamin sheet covering. Result, it is lighter than what it would be with MDF, but given the bad quality plywood, it is brittle.3. The instructions are worse than ikea. The whole set comes in 6 types of flat boards. No markings of sides, every board has 4 different way to install of which only 1 is the right way. Or you will have to open the screw. Luckily I didn't even get that far, I only installed one screw and by the time I try to install second, it broke before it even went all the way in.Suggestion to maker: Please don't cheap out using those stupid aluminium screws, please include some good quality magnetic screws and also try covering the holes with metal washers, so that the screwing in is easy without the whole brittle plywood piece fall off.The surface is slippery, and the hole patters don't even stay on ground. It requires 2-3 people.That said, the quality may be is justified for the price it is being offered. I just feel bad that, I am willing to pay extra, but give me a better quality product. I thought the design is really good, but the installation is a pain.Wouldn't recommend this item to a friend. If any better products will definitely consider buying from this buyer.Lastly, message to Amazon : Don't call it overnight if you can't deliver overnight. After expecting it on overnight, it came 2 days later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little chair and desk
reviews.reviewText: This is for my granddaughter when she visits. Love that the chair closes up inside the desk so it doesn’t take up too much space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I gifted my granddaughter this for Christmas. It’s such a cute table and compact. Especially for a one year old.
